definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to look at/to see/to see (a doctor)/to visit

sentences.english: And if you thought there was an intellectual/emotional disconnect before, wait till you see this thing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你以前认为这里有什么脱节的话，等着瞧。

sentences.english: Some of the commenters are pessimist. Wait and watch.
sentences.chinese: 从评论来看，有些人是悲观主义者，等着瞧。

sentences.english: She hugged me, and I saw her “we’ll see about that” look.
sentences.chinese: 她紧抱着我，我看见她那“我们等着瞧”的表情。

sentences.english: I don't ask you to believe me. All you have to do is wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 我不求你相信，只要你等着瞧。

sentences.english: It remains to be seen whether CAGC is a real company.
sentences.chinese: 艾瑞泰克是否是一家真实存在的公司，仍要等着瞧。

sentences.english: Stay tuned, I believe there will be a statement soon from SFA Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 等着瞧，我相信北京的国家林业局马上会发表声明。

sentences.english: Well, I'll telling you. You wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我说的不会错，你就等着瞧吧。

sentences.english: Lets see about that , I will work hard to blaze a trail in this new company.
sentences.chinese: 等着瞧吧，我一定会努力工作在新公司杀出一条血路。

sentences.english: Let's wait and see what transpires.
sentences.chinese: 让我们等着瞧，看会发生什么事。

sentences.english: I just have to wait and see.
